divs: Sighting DetailsWe had just returned from a night out for dinner . i noticed what looked like three dots moving straight up but keeping perfect formation like it was one vehicle . that disappeared quickly but came back so i got excited and had my wife try and see them . when she finally saw the one i saw she got a little scared and thats when we saw the second formation much larger but like the first what appeared to be 6 or 8 dots flying in perfect formation so i assume they were actually one vehicle ?? I have seen all sorts of known planes ,jets, ect. and this was not like anything i have ever seen .speeds that were so much faster than are fastest jets , moving miles in seconds ! i for one have been changed and will remain vigilant with camera near by for the next time !
Summary: My wife and i had just got home when i noticed an unusuall craft for just seconds and it shot up out of sight but came back . we were both able to see them
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Delhi Charter Township
There were no other sightings in Delhi Charter Township on or around March 31st 2012
